name: Sauk Mind
summary: Three stories of three beings. Sauk, a soul and its mission as such. The life before the death of that soul with the issues he left to solve, and Estefan Tromani, Romanian that we incarnate in a big city. Tromani is involved in accessing a dangerous group of criminals called Club Five. Club Five is a small and discreet organization that operates above legality and morality, always involved in shady jobs, unknown to many and very few are able to put name and face to its members. They execute their business with bloody efficiency. The access to Club Five will not be free and everyone who belongs to them knows it well. Tromani will have to perform some loyalty and submission tests that few people would be willing to pass.
